entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
